application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Following consultation with Pat's Tree Surgery, the large trees on my property with TPO need some maintenance as listed below. In summary the trees have not been attended to for a number of years, they are too big, have falling branches, need to be cleaned to remove dead wood, and need a reduction. T0134 T30 CONF (Holly) - full crown reduction, 2-3 metres off in width, 2 metres off the canopy, 2-3 metres off in height - Leaving hight 4 metres -Leaving canopy spread 2 metres T0134 T33 CONF(Prunus) - 30% reduction, 2-3 metres off the width, 1.5-2 metres off the canopy, 2-3 metres off height - Leaving hight 4 metres -Leaving canopy spread 2 metres T0134 T34 CONF (Lime) - thin out and clean out the dead wood. 2-3 metres off the width, 2-3 metres off the canopy, 2-3 metres height off - Leaving hight 5 metres -Leaving canopy spread 2.5 metres T0134 T29 CONF (Bay) 2-3 metres off the width, 2-3 metres off the canopy, 2-3 metres height off - Leaving hight 4 metres -Leaving canopy spread 2 metres T0134 T28 CONF (Yew) - thin out and clean out dead wood. 2-3 metres off the width 2-3 metres off the canopy 2-3 metres height off - Leaving hight 4 metres Leaving canopy spread 2 metres
